content.question: Which of the following best describes the change in Antarctic temperature from about <math alttext="440,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>440</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years ago to about <math alttext="340,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>340</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years ago?

choices.label: The temperature increases by about <math alttext="10 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The temperature decreases by about <math alttext="8 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The temperature increases by about <math alttext="12 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and then decreases by about <math alttext="12 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The temperature decreases by about <math alttext="10 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and then increases by about <math alttext="12 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The temperature increases by about <math alttext="12 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and then decreases by about <math alttext="12 degrees Celsius" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>°</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
